name: Poisson The King
description:
WASD - Move

Left Mouse Click - Pickup Food

Avoid enemies and move the food to the king in order to win.

This game was made in 34 hours.

Kyle Lagrimas - Artist,

Ikaro Siqueira Rodrigues Vitor - Programming / Level Designer, https://ikarosiqueira.itch.io/;

Stephanie Cheung - Project Manager / Artist,

Justin Wong - Programming / Level Designer, https://justinwong.itch.io/;

Zayle Radomi - Programming / Artist. https://zayleradomi.itch.io/;
